item.description:
Join the Boston Dyke March at the largest Lesbian Pool Party in New England. Please help support the Boston Dyke March by buying your FuSion Pool Party Tickets through www.bostondykemarch.com. A portion of every ticket sale will go directly towards the Boston Dyke March. Thank you for your support.


FuSion 2009 Pool Party
Pool Party and Lounge (Indoor/Outdoor Event)
Saturday August 15, 2009
Randolph Country Club
Randolph, MA

Join us and thousands of women for the largest Lesbian Pool Party in New England.

Featuring some great acts both outdoors and indoors in the lounge. Music by Pepper Mashay ("Dive in the Pool/Let's Get Soaking Wet"), Lauren Bateman, and Karen Grenier. Comedians Jackie Monahan and Mimi Gonzalez will be performing as well. Plus a performance by the day's host, Afrodite.

* Pool Side Dance Party with DJ Dena, DJ La Nena, and DJ Kristin Korpos. Dancing, BBQ Pit, VIP Cabanas, Special Guest Performers, and much more...

*The Sandbox - volleyball, dodgeball, sand castles, oil wrestling

* Sexy Burlesque Performers, cocktail service, performance art, poetry, webisodes, and movie shorts.

* Cabana upgrades are available as well.


Pool Party Passes are $25 in advance, so get your tickets early. They are on sale online now. Go to www.bostondykemarch.com to purchase advance tickets!

-----------------------------------------
The fun starts Friday night 8/14/09 at PURE Nightclub in Boston...

Friday August 14, 2009
PURE in Boston

Comedian Suzanne Westenhoefer kicks off Fusion with a Friday night performance at PURE in Boston. Show starts at 8:30pm.

Fearless, bold, unapologetic, and freaking hilarious best describes Comedian Suzanne Westenhoefer. She’s made a career out of telling the truth. And, the truth is, life is funny and no one is off limits. From her mom’s Last Will and Testament to her dog’s embarrassing discovery, Suzanne shares stories that leave audiences in stitches.

Buy tickets online for $25 ($30 at the door) for General Admission
VIP tickets are $40 and includes a meet and greet with Suzanne following the show.

-----------------------
Please visit www.bostondykemarch.com to purchase you tickets for Friday and/or Saturday's events. Thank you!

group.who: Friends of the Boston Dyke March
group.name: The Boston Dyke March

item.name: Join us at the FuSion 2009 Pool Party
